Text: Come on guys, buy the album. Support him =)

Buy the album and support this wonderful person!
He's really worth it.
I'm all for buying it, and I would if I could.

@ignite88 and Zhidar

apparently you don't fully understand the point of filesharing.  people download the albums to determine if they want to buy it.  its not that we don't want to support the artist, we just don't want to invest $10-15 on something that turns out to be crap.  I, for one, have only heard Beautifully, and I'm not sold on him yet.
